title: Uco Bank IMPS issue: Slim chance of full recovery this fiscal, says bank MD
description: Uco Bank is struggling to recover the full Rs 820 crore mistakenly transferred to various account holders. So far, it has managed to reclaim about 90% of the amount. The bank's chairman, Aswaini Kumar, indicated that recovering the remaining Rs 88 crore by the fiscal year-end seems unlikely.
